data.text: Wɔiti wo zeini ziɛ zaama yooiti ta kpoloɗɛi laaʋɛ yooiti su, à woilo gòoi ma!
É dàawooi ɠɛɛni ga boɠa zɔkpɔi gaaliai,
É ɠɛni mà: «Ɗɛi è ga Izilayɛle, ɗa ga nà-botiɠɛ nui,
Anɛɛ naa ʋe, nɔ̀un gè ɠɛni:
Niizu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɓɔɛzu,
É boni ga:
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
ga è ɠɛ kasoɠa nuiti ma: ‹À ɠula,›
Pului la mɔ ti zoga ɓaa kpɔɔle wɔin.
Nà nà-gizeiti pɛ falibo, ti ɠɛ ga peleiti,
Wɛlɛ tiya ɠanu ti ʋaazu.
Geeɠɔlɔgiti, à wa-ɠoozunɛɛi ɠula kɛlɛma!
Siyɔn ɠa ɠɛɛzu ma:
«Anzanui ɠa yeema nɛi ná-doun ɲɛgi ma, é kulazu su?
Wɛlɛ gè è-laaseigi zɛʋɛa zèaʋɛti,
Zɔiti ti ʋaazu è losu ʋolu,
Ɠaazu wuzeɠe, è wɛlɛ è-maaɠoolii zu,
«Mazɔlɔɔ ɗa-yooi koloɠolo suɲakai, gaaʋalagai ba,
Ɗa è-lointi goomɛni ʋolu,
Ɗa ɠɛ ɓɔɠɔ ɠaazaɠasu naazu ga:
Maliɠii Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Masagiti ta ɠɛ ga è-lointi kala nuiti,
Kɔɔɠuluɓai ná-kɔɔzoganii,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI wooi ɠaa:
Nà ɓɔi è zili nuiti da,
